title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Optimize software and AI Agent procurement with AWS Marketplace (COP212)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过 AWS Marketplace 优化软件和 AI Agent 采购 (COP212)
abstract: Transform your software and AI agent procurement with the governance and reporting capabilities of AWS Marketplace. In this session, learn how to visualize your software deployment footprint, distribute licenses efficiently, and gain visibility into spend and usage using the out-of-box tools and built-in features of AWS Marketplace. Discover how leading enterprises are accelerating cloud procurement through efficient use of the Single Pane of Glass Dashboard, purchase orders, and our new AI Agents and Tools solution category. See practical strategies for implementing software governance that reduces administrative overhead and enables procurement at scale.
abstract_cn: 通过 AWS Marketplace 的治理和报告功能转变您的软件和 AI 代理采购方式。在本次会议中，了解如何可视化您的软件部署足迹、高效分配许可证，以及使用 AWS Marketplace 的开箱即用工具和内置功能获得支出和使用情况的可见性。探索领先企业如何通过高效使用单一管理面板仪表板、采购订单以及我们新推出的 AI 代理和工具解决方案类别来加速云采购。了解实施软件治理的实用策略，以减少管理开销并实现大规模采购。
